programme.desc: Highlights of 100. Jerry Seinfeld, the actor, recounts the first 99 episodes of the show that featured the comedic adventures of Jerry Seinfeld, the character, and his friends George, Elaine, and Kramer. Highlight clips from the first five and a half seasons of the show fill this episode, which was originally the first half of a one-hour episode. "Highlights of a Hundred" was actually shot after all of the episodes for the show's sixth season had been taped, despite airing February 2, 1995, in the middle of the season. It was later split into two half-hour programs for syndication

programme.title: TMZ
programme.desc: This daily show-biz gossip and "expose" series was a spinoff of the popular interactive website TMZ, an acronym for the "Thirty Mile Zone" surrounding Hollywood. Created in 2005, TMZ had gained national prominence by breaking the story of Mel Gibson's anti-Semitic tirade after his arrest for drunken driving. By the time the TV version of TMZ premiered the week of September 10, 2007, the operation had once again scooped its scandal-rag competition with its coverage of O.J. Simpson's profanity-laden "invasion" of the home of a collectibles dealer who was allegedly selling Simpson memorabilia without permission. In fact, TMZ on TV had a wealth of celebrity-meltdown yarns to choose from during its shakedown week, ranging from the substance-abuse problems of Lindsay Lohan to the ill-fated "comeback" concert of Britney Spears. Harvey Levin, managing editor for both versions of TMZ, appeared on-camera as a correspondent, along with Sean Borg, Michael Hundgen, Katie Darryl and Teresa Strasser. TMZ on TV was seen primarily on local Fox or Fox-owned affiliates throughout the U.S

programme.title: District 9
programme.desc: Neill Blomkamp's debut feature is a thoughtful sci-fi thriller about aliens stranded on Earth, which tells a social parable that couldn't be more opposite to its South African setting. Back in the early 80s a spaceship grinds to a halt above Johannesburg. On investigation, the colossal craft is found to house insect-like bipeds, all in a very bad shape. Eventually allowed to land on the planet, the occupants are confined to District 9, a shabby outlying suburb. Now, around 20 years later, the entire population of 'prawns', as the aliens have offensively been labelled, are to be moved to a distant detention camp, with Afrikaner bureaucrat Wikus van de Merwe placed in charge of their relocation. But when van de Merwe has a grim accident, he's given a radically different perspective on the affair, and little choice but to team up with the extra-terrestrials. Mixing elements of horror and action-thriller into the allegorical whole, the Oscar- and Bafta-nominated fantasy, produced by Peter Jackson, uses top-notch CGI to create a believable setting and to move the pace along nicely. In English, with subtitles for the dialogue in Afrikaans, Nyanja, Zulu, Xhosa, Sotho and the aliens' language

programme.desc: The I.Q. Man. After Jesse (John Stamos) and Joey (David Coulier) prepare a cologne commercial, their client insists upon featuring Jesse in the leading role--wearing practically no clothes, and surrounded by similarly undraped female models. Concerned over the effect that this will have on his fiancee Becky (Lisa Loughlin), Jesse refuses to do what the client wants. This sudden attack of integrity leads to a life-altering (and rather traumatic) experience. Meanwhile, the cure may turn out to be infinitely worse than the disease when Michelle (role shared by the Olsen twins) plays nurse for Steph (Jodie Sweetin), who is confined to bed with a bad cold

The SVU is surprised when Dickie Stabler (Jeffrey Scapperaota), the young son of detective Elliot Stabler (Christopher Meloni), points out that the police photos taken at the scene of a prostitute's rape-murder match the images in a new, particularly violent video game. Following this lead, Stabler and his colleagues arrest a pair of teenage "computer addicts" for the crime. Now it falls to Assistant DA Casey Novak (Diane Neal) to tear apart the argument of defense attorney Oliver Gates (Barry Bostwick) that the youthful killers were unable to separate fantasy from reality--and that the video game itself should be put on trial

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Obsessed begins when Ellena Roberts (Jenna Elfman), a highly successful medical writer, is yanked out of her apartment and arrested on a charge of harrassment. It seems that Roberts has been dogging the trail of famous neurosurgeon Dr. David Stillman (Sam Robards), whom she met during a medical convention. According to Ellena, she and the very married Stillman had a torrid affair, whereupon Stillman promised to divorce his wife and marry her. When Stillman denied these charges, Ellena inaugurated a campaign of psychological warfare to reclaim the doctor for herself, going so far as to break into his house in the dead of night. The subsequent court trial boils down to a matter of he said/she said, with the neurotic but quick-witted Ellena certain that she can sway the jury to her favor -- even though her own attorney (Kate Burton) suspects that Ellena has merely imagined the entire affair. Much of the story is related through the conversations between Ellena and a fiercely feminist journalist (Lisa Edelstein), whose devotion to Ellena borders on the surreal. Something of a cross between Fatal Attraction and A Beautiful Mind, the made-for-cable Obsessed originally aired September 16, 2002, on the Lifetime network

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: Steve Pink's boisterous sci-fi comedy stars John Cusack (who also produced), Rob Corddry, Craig Robinson and Clark Duke as four men who find an unusual portal through time. Adam and his friends Nick and Lou are in their 40s and deeply dissatisfied with the way their lives have turned out. Wanting to recapture a little of the hedonism and youthful anarchy of their 20s, they take a trip to a resort they frequented back then for a trip down memory lane. Taking along Adam's nephew Jacob for the ride, they are disappointed to find that the resort is now more or less a ramshackle ruin. However, after realising that its hot tub still works, they discover to their surprise that the fancy bath is in fact a time machine. So, instead of reminiscing about their youth, they get the chance to actually relive it, as all are transported back to 1986. Cue the movie's raison d'être - a satirical look (via the eyes of Jacob) at the ethos of 80s' teen movies and the general mores of the time, as well as an intriguingly honest exploration of the minds of men in the midst of their mid-life crises. Joining in the fun, with extremely game cameos, are Chevy Chase and Crispin Glover

Scripted by Robert Presnell, Jr. from a short story by John Collier, this Twilight Zone episode focuses on Robert Shackleforth (George Grizzard), a lovestruck young man who cannot get the girl of his dreams, the ravishing Leila (Patricia Barry), to acknowledge his existence. In desperation, Robert pays a visit to the mysterious Professor Daemon (John McIntyre), who gives the young would-be romeo a potion that transforms the icy Leila into Robert's "love slave." Before long, however, Robert regrets having Leila hanging upon him like a clinging vine, leading him to contemplate using Daemon's special antidote: The dreaded "glove cleaner." Previously dramatized in 1951 on Billy Rose Television Theater, "The Chaser" made its Twilight Zone bow on May 13, 1960

Thinking the seemingly lifeless animal looks like a friend back home, Louis puts his lucky red jacket on the kangaroo to snap a photo. programme.desc: The Wheels on the Bus... The BAU deal with one of their most elaborate abductions yet when a school bus of teenagers vanishes into thin air during a routine journey

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Magnificent Light. An attendee at a popular motivational-speaker's conference in Seattle is murdered and the speaker himself disappears soon afterward. Meanwhile, Garcia is puzzled when Morgan refuses to attend a dinner honoring an old family friend

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The Lesson. The time for Reid to meet his mystery woman arrives, but the BAU's current case involving a string of peculiar abductions makes him fearful for her safety

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Perennials. A serial killer whose crimes closely match those of a murderer from 30 years ago is pursued. Meanwhile, the team learns that someone is tracking their cases and replicating crimes the unit is solving

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Zugzwang. Reid's girlfriend is kidnapped by a stalker, and the unit conducts a search to find her

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Magnum Opus. While Reid attempts to overcome the loss of Maeve, the rest of the team travels to San Francisco in order to investigate a series of bodies discovered in the Mission District

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: All That Remains. The BAU travel to Maryland when a father's 911 call raises a red flag. As the facts of the case emerge, they wonder if he's a victim or a suspect

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Broken. The party's over for three young adults who were abducted from separate gatherings before being murdered. As the BAU dig deeper, they discover one had a secret

programme.title: Saving Hope
programme.desc: Don't Poke the Bear. American hospital drama series. Alex and Charlie work on a couple who have supposedly been mauled by a bear, but things aren't all they seem

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia's Wedding. Sophia is reunited with a man she's hated for 40 years---her late husband's partner (Jack Gilford). Part 1 of two. Estelle Getty. Salvadore: Sid Melton. Caterer: Raye Birk. Preacher: Harvey J. Goldenberg

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia's Wedding. Tensions rise when Sophia's new husband Max moves into her and Dorothy's house. Meanwhile, will the lovebird's new business venture take off?

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: When a Man Loves Two Women
programme.desc: When a Man Loves Two Women. Frasier makes an inept attempt to juggle romances with two women

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Visions of Daphne. Daphne learns that Donny plans to propose, but then a psychic vision suggests that he might not be her dream man

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Shutout in Seattle. Niles is desperate and lonely when he realises he has no romantic prospects, while Daphne, Frasier and even Martin are all happy

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Shutout in Seattle. Conclusion. Frasier is focused on Faye, but he keeps saying "Cassandra"; meanwhile, Roz has an unfortunate fling and Martin's relationship with Bonnie goes to the dogs

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Momma Mia. The Cranes celebrate Dad's birthday by returning to the cabin where they vacationed as kids

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Father of the Bride. Frasier takes a hand in Daphne's wedding plans, and Roz is afraid that she's going to be asked to be a bridesmaid

programme.title: Cheers (?)
programme.desc: Cliff's Rocky Moment.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Fortune and Men's Weights. Luckless Coach is suckered into buying an antique scale that gives out fortune cards that seem to be coming true, and all the weighty prognosticating leads the gang to believe that the device possesses supernatural abilities. Greg: Tim Cunningham. Deliveryman No. 1: Alan Fine. Deliveryman No. 2: Charles Champion

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Hedda Hopper Story. Charlie Pomerantz (Hy Averback), press agent for Ricky Ricardo (Desi Arnaz), arranges a publicity stunt whereby Ricky will "rescue" a supposedly drowning woman from the pool of the Beverly Palms Hotel. This act of courage is sure to win Ricky a mention in the newspaper column of influential gossip diva Hedda Hopper. Chosen to appear as the "drowning victim," Lucy (Lucille Ball) keeps a sharp eye peeled for Hedda's arrival at the pool, making certain to look for the woman wearing the most outrageous hat. Alas, the stunt proves to be a bust -- until Lucy's mother, Mrs. McGillicuddy (Kathryn Card), of all people, saves the day

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Don Juan Is Shelved. Ricky (Desi Arnaz) plunges into a deep depression when he learns that MGM plans to shelve his upcoming debut film, "Don Juan." Hoping to save Ricky's movie career, Lucy (Lucille Ball), Fred (William Frawley), and Ethel (Vivian Vance) concoct all manner of wacky schemes. When these fail, Lucy hires a actor to pose as a big-time movie producer who will make Ricky a fabulous film offer in the presence of MGM's CEO, Dore Schary. Unfortunately, the actor she hires happens to be Dore Schary himself! (Ironically, the real Dore Schary was to have appeared in this episode, but at the last moment developed a case of stage fright; he was replaced by Philip Ober, who at that time was the husband of I Love Lucy co-star Vivian Vance.)

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Bullfight Dance. In order to wangle an appearance in a TV fundraiser hosted by her husband, Ricky (Desi Arnaz), Lucy (Lucille Ball) resorts to a little unsubtle extortion, threatening to sabotage Ricky's upcoming "Photoplay" magazine article unless she is allowed to perform. After several misfire rehearsals, Ricky finally finds the "perfect" role for Lucy: as the bull (in full costume) in a "matador" dance. Lucy agrees to the dance but not the costume...and on the night of a telecast, "bullfighter" Ricky finds himself face to face with a very benign-looking cow (and guess who's playing the other end of the cow?)

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Hollywood Anniversary. Lucy raises a ruckus when Ricky forgets their anniversary. Maybe a lavish party at Mocambo will restore peace. And maybe it won't. Mrs. McGillicuddy: Kathryn Card. Bobby: Robert Jellison. Ross: Ross Elliott

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Star Upstairs. Ever on the prowl for Hollywood celebrities, Lucy (Lucille Ball) is thrilled to discover that movie star Cornel Wilde has rented the penthouse suite just above the Ricardos' Beverly Hills hotel room. Determined to catch a closeup glimpse of Wilde, Lucy first disguises herself as a bellboy, then hides under a luncheon cart that is wheeled into the actor's room. As expected, things go awry, and Lucy ends up trying to use a "rope" of blankets to escape from Wilde's high-rise terrace!

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: In Palm Springs. Rock Hudson makes a rare pre-McMillan and Wife TV appearance in this episode, in which Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) take a trip to Palm Springs without Ricky (Desi Arnaz) and Fred (William Frawley). This is part of a strategy to avoid the "boredom" of too much marital togetherness, but before long the girls are yearning to be reunited with their husbands -- and vice versa. Of course, Lucy and Ethel could never admit that they were wrong to take a trip alone, nor are Ricky and Fred willing to admit that they're lonely. It takes the timely arrival of movie star Rock Hudson for the boys and the girls to get back together again with a minimum of muss and fuss

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.sub-title: One Flew Out of the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: One Flew Out of the Cuckoo's Nest. Blanche is shocked when her Uncle Lucas and Dorothy announce plans to wed. But the engagement is a prank - until they fall in love

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.sub-title: One Flew Out of the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: One Flew Out of the Cuckoo's Nest. Dorothy is getting married to Blanche's Uncle Lucas. The ladies say their farewells in a touching tribute to friendship and family

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Pilot Episode. Four single middle-aged women share a house in Miami Beach, Florida. Featuring witty Dorothy, man-hunting Blanche, spaced-out Rose and Dorothy's outspoken mother, Sophia

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.sub-title: Guess Who's Coming to the Wedding
programme.desc: Guess Who's Coming to the Wedding. The weddings bells are ringing for Dorothy's daughter Kate- but she's got cold feet! As Dorothy tries to fix things- her ex-husband appears

programme.title: Home & Family
programme.desc: Rachel York discusses "Grey Gardens: The Musical"; Brandi Chastain visits; Rose Lawrence bakes a transparent chocolate pie; Nancy Redd talks about "So-Me." Also: wall art crafted from recycled belts; cat-inspired sleeping masks; games with pool noodles

programme.title: Home & Family
programme.desc: Victor Webster talks about "Summer Villa"; Shaun Robinson discusses the importance of empowering young women; Debbie prepares make-ahead meals. Also: tips on simmer skin care; dorm-room necessities; handmade woven denim jackets; summer lawn-care advice

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The King Is Dead. Jonathan is convinced that he has talent as a wrestler, but it is all part of a man's plan to have a rigged wrestling match. Mrs. Oleson ends up betting the church's funds on the match

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Faith Healer. James Olson guest stars as "Reverend" Edward Danforth, a bombastic faith healer who descends upon Walnut Grove. So persuasive is Danforth's rhetoric and his laying-on-of-hands technique that soon both Rev. Alden (Dabbs Greer) and Doc Baker (Kevin Hagen) are shunned by the community as being hopelessly old-fashioned. But Danforth is exposed as a fraud when tragedy strikes in the home of a boy suffering from a ruptured appendix

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Author, Author. Caroline's father moves in with the Ingalls when his wife dies. Charles tries to get him to write a book to help him stop feeling lonely

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Crossed Connections. Mrs. Oleson finds out that Mrs. Garvey had a husband before marrying Jonathan

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike Hires Chuck. A company billboard is defaced, prompting Mike to seek out Chuck's security firm. Meanwhile, Mandy's humbleness about completing household tasks benefits Eve

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Eve's Breakup. Eve breaks up with her boyfriend and claims to be fine, but her loved ones aren't so sure, and they all have opinions on how she should handle her post-breakup feelings

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Big Brother. Mike worries about the family's privacy after a neighbor's security camera captures Vanessa turning a hose on a cat, but when he looks at more of the footage, he also views Mandy in a troubling situation

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Three Sundays. Mike provides encouragement to Ryan and Kyle and tells them to assert their beliefs, and giving them advice makes Mike realize how vital it is for the guys to have a strong male role model in their lives

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Kyle's Friend. Kyle befriends a homeless man who goes missing, so Mike uses his resources to try to locate him. Meanwhile, Kyle's actions motivate Mandy to assist a young mom at a women's shelter

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mandy's Party. Mandy plans to host a house party—with alcohol—while her parents are away, but those plans change when a very surprised Mike and Vanessa return home early. Elsewhere, Kristin gets cold feet after hearing Ed's unusual theories on marriage and divorce

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: The Fun House. Frankie fears her job is on the line when a motivational consultant is hired. Meanwhile, Mike is tasked with tackling the many issues in the Heck household

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: The Final Four. Mike has a dilemma on his hands when Frankie forces him to choose between attending her uncle's funeral or going to the dream-realising big Final Four game

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: TV or Not TV. Frankie and Mike eliminate their cable TV to cut down on expenses, but they miss it more than they thought they would. Meanwhile, Brick and his friends go through another kind of withdrawal when the school library is closed during recess, and they're forced out onto the playground with the other kids

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Worry Duty. Frankie's concerned when Axl's former girlfriend, Morgan, is back on the scene. Meanwhile, Brick looks after a baby chick for a school science project

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.sub-title: One Flew Out of the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: One Flew Out of the Cuckoo's Nest. Blanche is shocked when her Uncle Lucas and Dorothy announce plans to wed. But the engagement is a prank - until they fall in love

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.sub-title: One Flew Out of the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: One Flew Out of the Cuckoo's Nest. Dorothy is getting married to Blanche's Uncle Lucas. The ladies say their farewells in a touching tribute to friendship and family

programme.title: Get Even Before Leavin'
programme.desc: With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray finds himself on a road trip with Mickey to Primm, in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house. And Terry gains confidence as a trainer

programme.title: Trump Show
programme.desc: The political circus goes into overdrive as Trump is crowned the Republican nominee - and Melania, controversially, speaks! Capitalizing on his children to help humanize his image, can Trump plus Pence finally rally a unified party?

programme.title: Friends and Family
programme.desc: In the band's hometown of Denver, a throng of needy friends and family descend upon the crew, including band member Christopher House's infamous ex-girlfriend, who must be kept away from him at all costs

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: Man of the Year
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as wise-guy who has made a career out of skewering politicians on his talk shows until he comes up with the ultimate joke: to run for president himself and in the process, ignites a grassroots movement that could change America. Co-stars Laura Linney, Christopher Walken, Jeff Goldblum, and Lewis Black

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: Robert DeNiro and John Travolta star as two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- who find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: This Academy Award® winning classic masterfully unravels from an LA interrogation room where the police are questioning a conman in order to solve the case of a multimillion-dollar heist gone wrong that involved himself and four other criminals under the thrall of a mythic crime lord. Stars Kevin Spacey, Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne and Pete Postelthwaite

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Anne Heche and Harrison Ford as a New York magazine editor and a gruff pilot who must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio star as a married couple trying to escape the suburban inertia of 1950s Connecticut but when they put an audacious plan in motion to move to Paris, their relationship is pushed to the brink

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: Alfie (2004)
programme.desc: Jude Law stars in this romantic drama as a womanizing British limo driver in Manhattan who finds that his good looks, devil-may-care attitude and little-boy charm are becoming poor substitutes for true love and lasting friendship. Marisa Tomei, Sienna Miller, Susan Sarandon, Omar Epps and Nia Long costar in this remake of the 1966 classic

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson

programme.title: Get Even Before Leavin'
programme.desc: With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray finds himself on a road trip with Mickey to Primm, in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house. And Terry gains confidence as a trainer

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: In this Australian horror flick a young nurse begins work at an isolated psychiatric ward, and quickly becomes fascinated with a brain dead patient who is the subject of a mad scientist's cruel and unusual experiments. What starts as an innocent fascination quickly takes a sinister turn, as the patient begins to use his psychic powers to manipulate her every move

programme.title: The Descent 2
programme.desc: Horror about a woman who emerges alone from the Appalachian cave system where she encountered unspeakable terrors and is forced to return to the subterranean depths to help locate her missing friends. As the rescue party goes deeper into uncharted caverns, nightmarish visions of the past begin to haunt her and she must fight for survival and redemption

programme.title: Exorcismus
programme.desc: Spanish horror film about a fifteen year old girl who falls prey to a series of seizures that leave doctors baffled, forcing her parents to summon a priest to deal with the sinister forces lurking within her

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: Despite warnings to the contrary, a high-school student befriends the ghost of a misfit classmate who may have been murdered, and becomes torn between the world of the living and the dead. Stars Liv Tyler

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.title: Don't Blink
programme.desc: A gripping suspense thriller about a group of friends who arrive at a secluded mountain resort to find it completely deserted. With no gas for the return trip, they are forced to stay and investigate the mystery surrounding the abandoned lodge. Stars Mena Suvari

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: This eerie, artful horror phantasm stars Anastasia Hille as a film producer who unexpectedly receives a farmhouse inheritance in her native Russia - a mysterious, island-bound structure that houses many ghostly secrets about her unknown past. Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: The Abandoned

Karel Roden costars in this effective, chilling genre picture cowritten and directed by Nacho Cerda

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett is a small-town psychic named Annie, a widow using her clairvoyance to support herself and her sons. When she has visions involving the death of a local party girl (Katie Holmes), she suspects Donnie (Keanu Reeves), a violent wife beater. Sure enough, the victim's body is recovered in Donnie's pond, but is Annie interpreting her visions correctly, or is a killer still on the loose?

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wet Foot/Dry Foot
programme.desc: Two Cuban refugees attempting to reach the United States on a handmade raft find themselves stranded on a deserted island off the Florida coast in the winning short film from this year's competition

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Gordo
programme.desc: An ambitious young Mexican father leaves behind his popular taco stand for a chance to start his own restaurant in the United States

programme.title: Dreamscape
programme.desc: In this visually awe-inspiring sci-fi adventure, a psychic (Dennis Quaid) who uses his ESP abilities only for financial gain is hired to project himself into the dreams of scientific subjects as part of a groundbreaking clinical study. When he discovers a plot to assassinate the president of the United States, however, he must put aside his mercenary nature to literally save the world

programme.title: Russell Mulcahy's Tale of the Mummy
programme.desc: A centuries old curse is awakened by a young archeologist who sets out to retrace her grandfather's footsteps by unearthing an ancient Egyptian mummy -- and now she is on the run from a deadly power that threatens to destroy humanity

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Reeker
programme.desc: A group of disparate strangers including a blind genius and a druggie who ripped off his ecstasy dealer converges on a small, abandoned town where they are promptly slaughtered one at a time by a grotesque and extremely foul-smelling creature. Devon Gummersall, Derek Richardson and Tina Illman star in this tongue-in-cheek horror flick

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: Danny Glover stars as a brilliant mathematician who returns to his family home after 30 years away to discover that tragic events from his past may be in danger of repeating themselves. Plagued by déjà vu, he is convinced his young neighbor and her mother are doomed to die on the anniversary of his wife and daughter's deaths. Struggling to unlock the pattern, he tries to convince his brother-in-law, a policeman, of the impending tragedy, but the facts don't add up. Is he losing his mind, or running out of time?

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wet Foot/Dry Foot
programme.desc: Two Cuban refugees attempting to reach the United States on a handmade raft find themselves stranded on a deserted island off the Florida coast in the winning short film from this year's competition

programme.title: Russell Mulcahy's Tale of the Mummy
programme.desc: A centuries old curse is awakened by a young archeologist who sets out to retrace her grandfather's footsteps by unearthing an ancient Egyptian mummy -- and now she is on the run from a deadly power that threatens to destroy humanity

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico

programme.title: Dreamscape
programme.desc: In this visually awe-inspiring sci-fi adventure, a psychic (Dennis Quaid) who uses his ESP abilities only for financial gain is hired to project himself into the dreams of scientific subjects as part of a groundbreaking clinical study. When he discovers a plot to assassinate the president of the United States, however, he must put aside his mercenary nature to literally save the world

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: INXS: Never Tear Us Apart - Part 1
programme.desc: How six suburban boys in a band from Australia conquered the world with a unique sound and a work ethic that became legendary. This two-part drama charts the rise of INXS from the Sydney pub rock scene of the early 1980s to the pinnacle of the music industry to the tragedy that brought it all to a crashing halt. Featuring a stellar cast and unprecedented access to an archive of music, it's the ultimate rock-'n'-roll story of mateship, conflict, success and excess

programme.title: INXS: Never Tear Us Apart - Part 2
programme.desc: How six suburban boys in a band from Australia conquered the world with a unique sound and a work ethic that became legendary. This two-part drama charts the rise of INXS from the Sydney pub rock scene of the early 1980s to the pinnacle of the music industry to the tragedy that brought it all to a crashing halt. Featuring a stellar cast and unprecedented access to an archive of music, it's the ultimate rock-'n'-roll story of mateship, conflict, success and excess

programme.title: Nas: Time Is Illmatic
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the making of Nas' 1994 groundbreaking debut album Illmatic that follows the artist as he returns to his childhood home to share stories of his upbringing and influences and tracks the thrilling evolution from his life as a young street poet to a visionary MC. Features interviews with his musical peers, including Pharrell Williams and Alicia Keys and the "Illmatic" producers

programme.title: Spark: A Burning Man Story
programme.desc: A compelling behind-the-scenes look into the cultural phenomenon of Burning Man. Filmmakers Steve Brown and Jessie Deeter embed themselves with the cofounders, staff and a select group of artists and attendees to create an inside look at this magical happening and its ongoing evolution, the people who make it a reality, and the unique effect it has on all those who attend

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: Need For Speed
programme.desc: Aaron Paul stars as a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate. Now, fresh from prison, he gets his hands on the fastest car around and joins a secretive and extremely high stakes race with revenge in mind, in this story of love, redemption and super fast cars

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places

programme.title: A Glimpse Inside the Mind of Charles Swan III
programme.desc: Set in stylized Los Angeles, Charlie Sheen stars in this quirky comedy as a successful graphic designer whose fame, money and charm have provided him with a seemingly perfect life but when his true love breaks off their relationship, his world spirals into doubt, confusion and fantasy. Also stars Bill Murray, Patricia Arquette and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: 21 Years: Richard Linklater
programme.desc: Documentary that takes a behind the scenes tour of groundbreaking director Richard Linklater's last 21 years creating his iconic legacy of films from the unconventional breakout 'Slacker' to the innovative 'Boyhood'. Features candid conversations with actors Ethan Hawke, Julie Delpy, Matthew McConaughey and others

programme.title: One Direction - Where We Are: Live from San Siro Stadium
programme.desc: Filmed over two nights at the iconic San Siro Stadium in Milan, this concert film features the chart topping pop sensation boy band One Direction performing all their biggest hits

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places

programme.title: The Mind of Mark DeFriest
programme.desc: Documentary about a legendary escape artist who comes up for parole after more than 30 years behind bars, but his chance for freedom must be weighed against his infamous past. Features interviews and graphic novel style animation

programme.title: The Next Hit
programme.desc: A mystery suspense thriller about a record company that takes an unorthodox approach to boosting sales by putting a 'hit' on their marquee talent's life with hopes of creating a multi-platinum recording legend

programme.title: Need For Speed
programme.desc: Aaron Paul stars as a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate. Now, fresh from prison, he gets his hands on the fastest car around and joins a secretive and extremely high stakes race with revenge in mind, in this story of love, redemption and super fast cars

programme.title: Bubble Boy
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this offbeat comedy as a teenager with an immune system deficiency, who has spent his entire life living in a plastic bubble under the doting, overprotective care of his mother. When he learns that the girl next door he secretly loves is going to be married, he assembles a "bubble suit" and sets out on a cross-country odyssey to woo her

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet

programme.title: The Way Of The Gun
programme.desc: From the screenwriter of "The Usual Suspects" comes this action-packed thriller starring Ryan Phillippe and Benicio del Toro as kidnappers angling for a big payday by snatching a pregnant woman (Juliette Lewis) who's carrying a wealthy couple's surrogate child. Unfortunately, a Mafia lawyer (James Caan) and his assassins (Taye Diggs and Nicky Katt) are taking the situation very personally, leading to a bloody desert confrontation where hidden truths are revealed

programme.title: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: A week before he's set to move across the country with his girlfriend, a young man impulsively sets out on a solo road trip across the US to see the nation's largest objects in this comedy of self-discovery

programme.title: Echoes of War
programme.desc: A Civil War veteran returns home to the quiet countryside, only to find himself embroiled in a conflict between his family and the cattle rancher neighbors

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer

programme.title: The Way Of The Gun
programme.desc: From the screenwriter of "The Usual Suspects" comes this action-packed thriller starring Ryan Phillippe and Benicio del Toro as kidnappers angling for a big payday by snatching a pregnant woman (Juliette Lewis) who's carrying a wealthy couple's surrogate child. Unfortunately, a Mafia lawyer (James Caan) and his assassins (Taye Diggs and Nicky Katt) are taking the situation very personally, leading to a bloody desert confrontation where hidden truths are revealed

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: Documentary that goes behind the stats to reveal the story of Kobe Bryant's career, exploring the mentorships, allies and rivalries that have helped shape his stellar 18-year tenure in the NBA, and offering access to his daily experiences, his lifelong inspirations and the battle with his greatest personal challenge yet

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this acclaimed remake from director Jonathan Demme ("The Silence of the Lambs") as Ben Marco, a U.S. Army major whose foggy memories of a terrifying Gulf War incident threaten to unravel the political ambitions of Raymond Shaw (Liev Schreiber), a former sergeant under Marco's command. Meryl Streep, Jon Voight, Kimberly Elise, Jeffrey Wright and Vera Farmiga co-star in this taut thriller

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: A dentist (Dane Cook) who is also a lifelong bachelor suddenly realizes at an ex-girlfriend's wedding that every woman he's ever slept with has found her true love with the very next man she dated - making him instant catnip to ladies only interested in benefiting from his "curse." Jessica Alba and Dan Fogler costar in this romantic comedy

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: Four black-suited, sunglasses-sporting criminals try to determine which of them is a rat or cop after a bank heist goes violently awry, in this stylish crime thriller that cleverly jumps around in time and features the witty, ironic dialogue and unexpected plot twists that would soon become the pop film culture hallmarks of first-time writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth and Steve Buscemi star in this instant classic

programme.title: Drunk Stoned Brilliant Dead: The Story of the National Lampoon
programme.desc: Documentary reliving National Lampoon's meteoric rise from the go-to humor magazine of the counterculture to a brand that launched Hollywood's biggest comedies, featuring unseen archival footage, beautiful and shocking art, interviews with the magazine's best-known artists and writers and commentary from Judd Apatow, John Goodman, Billy Bob Thornton, Christopher Buckley and Chevy Chase

programme.title: LEAVE THE WORLD BEHIND: Swedish House Mafia's Final Tour
programme.desc: Documentary following electronic super band Swedish House Mafia on their final tour before they call it quits that offers a rare look at the electronic music world, with breathtaking live footage and behind-the-scenes drama of three musicians who walk away from everything to save their friendship

programme.title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
programme.desc: The classic American novel by Mark Twain becomes this skillful adaptation starring Elijah Wood as a truant runaway who escapes down the Mississippi River accompanied by an escaped slave named Jim (Courtney B. Vance). Anne Heche costars

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer

programme.title: Peaceful Warrior
programme.desc: Adaptation of the New Age memoir about the life-altering philosophical relationship between a talented but arrogant young gymnast and a worldly and mystic gas station attendant named Socrates. Nick Nolte stars

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Comedy starring Daniel Radcliffe as a med school dropout who can't keep his love life in order or keep it separate from a new friendship with a woman who, inconveniently, has a boyfriend. Also stars Zoe Kazan and Adam Driver

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this drama about an idealistic California teacher who assigns her at-risk students in a gang-infested high school to writer journals that chronicle their troubled lives. Patrick Dempsey, Imelda Staunton and Scott Glenn costar

programme.title: The Drew
programme.desc: The incredible story of the unlikely rise of The Drew League from humble beginnings in the crime and gang infested streets of South Central Los Angeles to the nation's foremost pro-am basketball league. Crossing racial, cultural and socioeconomic barriers, The Drew celebrates the value of basketball, persistence, loyalty and above all, community. Featuring NBA stars Kevin Durant, DeMar DeRozan, Brandon Jennings and Baron Davis

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: A chilling sequel to "The Silence of the Lambs" starring Anthony Hopkins as genius serial killer Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter, resurfacing after a decade in hiding to contact his old nemesis Clarice Starling (Julianne Moore), who's now an FBI agent with career trouble. As he dodges both a greedy Italian police detective and a powerful but vengefully demented former victim, Hannibal plots to "help" Clarice in the most grisly fashion possible. Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta costar

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there¿s another side to her psychosis

programme.title: Sexquerade Ball
programme.desc: A couple with a feisty sex life decide to take a break after a big fight -- but after a series of erotic experiments with others, they find they still need each other after all. Will they be able to reunite at the masquerade ball?

programme.title: A Life In Dirty Movies
programme.desc: Documentary about legendary 1960s sexploitation director Joe Sarno and his loyal wife and collaborator Peggy Sarno. The film follows the pair for a year as they struggle to get a new project off the ground, while charting the evolution of softcore porn and revealing a sincere portrait of their passionate relationship on and off screen

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: Ewan McGregor stars in this by-turns shocking and hilarious comedy-drama about heroin addicted Scots, the sophomore feature of filmmaker Danny Boyle ("Shallow Grave"). He's Mark Renton, a junkie who loves his drug of choice and the exciting lifestyle it requires. Still, Mark knows his future's not very bright, so he kicks the habit and gets a real job, but his buddies Sick Boy (Jonny Lee Miller), Spud (Ewen Bremner) and Begbie (Robert Carlyle) drag him reluctantly back into his old ways. Based on the novel by Irvine Welsh

programme.title: Dennis Rodman's Big Bang in Pyongyang
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling flamboyant celebrity and former NBA basketballer Dennis Rodman's friendship with leader Kim Jong-un that sends him on a controversial mission to improve relations between North Korea and the US by staging a historic basketball game between the two countries. Despite nuclear threats, dissent and Rodman's personal struggles to keep it together, the game must go on

programme.title: Knock Knock, It's Tig Notaro
programme.desc: Documentary that follows deadpan comedian Tig Notaro across the country as she puts on a series of stand-up performances in the homes, backyards, barns and basements of her most loyal fans, with each intimate show offering the potential for epiphany or disaster

programme.title: Keeping Up With The Steins
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood battles his terrible shyness as his father wages his own battle to throw a bar mitzvah party that will outdo his rival. But everything is upended when the boy's estranged grandfather arrives in town, in this satire of materialism

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars in this dramatic comedy as a corporate downsizing expert whose cherished life on the road, without commitments, is threatened just when he's on the cusp of achieving his frequent flying dreams. Also stars Anna Kendrick

programme.title: Religulous
programme.desc: Cynically witty sociopolitical critic Bill Maher stars in this lacerating dissection of religious beliefs in such varied capitals of faith as the Vatican, Salt Lake City and Jerusalem, leaving no theological stone unturned, even those of Maher's own family members

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. Also stars Kathryn Hahn and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars in this thriller as Tom Ripley, a social schemer using his genius to forge a relationship with Dickie Greenleaf (Jude Law) and his girlfriend Marge (Gwyneth Paltrow), two bright, beautiful and wealthy young people who have everything Tom would literally kill for. Philip Seymour Hoffman and Cate Blanchett costar in this critically acclaimed film from director Anthony Minghella ("The English Patient") that was nominated for five Academy Awards

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars in this dramatic comedy as a corporate downsizing expert whose cherished life on the road, without commitments, is threatened just when he's on the cusp of achieving his frequent flying dreams. Also stars Anna Kendrick

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Christian Bale star in this blazing Western remake as, respectively, a daring outlaw and the humble farmer deputized to deliver him to justice. Peter Fonda, Gretchen Mol, Ben Foster and Alan Tudyk costar in this acclaimed frontier adventure

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: A group of troubled teenagers furloughed from juvenile detention to clean up an abandoned hotel slated to become a homeless shelter discover that a psychopathic killer now inhabits the premises and is more than eager to spill some blood. Steven Vidler and professional wrestler Kane (a.k.a. Glen Jacobs) star in this grisly horror thriller

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
programme.desc: Matt Damon stars in this thriller as Tom Ripley, a social schemer using his genius to forge a relationship with Dickie Greenleaf (Jude Law) and his girlfriend Marge (Gwyneth Paltrow), two bright, beautiful and wealthy young people who have everything Tom would literally kill for. Philip Seymour Hoffman and Cate Blanchett costar in this critically acclaimed film from director Anthony Minghella ("The English Patient") that was nominated for five Academy Awards

programme.title: Nothing to Lose
programme.desc: After finding out his wife is having an affair with his boss, a distraught LA guy who is carjacked, turns the tables on the carjacker and kidnaps him, heading off into the Arizona desert where the two men form an unlikely friendship that is hell-bent on revenge. Stars Tim Robbins and Martin Lawrence

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is back for more fast-paced action in this high-intensity sequel from director John Woo ("Face/Off"). Cruise is Ethan Hunt, a talented government agent ordered to bring down Sean Ambrose (Dougray Scott), a rogue fellow spy who plans to auction a stolen, deadly virus to the highest bidder. The bait? Ambrose's former lover Nyah (Thandie Newton), whose beauty and charm are not lost on Ethan. Anthony Hopkins, Ving Rhames, Rade Serbedzija and Brendan Gleeson costar in this hit thriller

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: 7/22/16
programme.desc: The 15th anniversary edition of the critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series, "ShoBox: The New Generation" features a stacked slate of talented prospects determined to fight for a world title: super bantamweight Adam Lopez (15-0, 7 KOs), super middleweight Ronald Ellis (12-0-1, 10 KOs), featherweight O'Shaquie Foster (10-1, 7 KOs) and super welterweight Khiary Gray Pitts (13-0, 10 KOs) all in separate bouts

programme.title: Double D Dude Ranch
programme.desc: Erotic tale about a bunch of busty cowgirls who know how to ride a stallion¿ hard

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: Four black-suited, sunglasses-sporting criminals try to determine which of them is a rat or cop after a bank heist goes violently awry, in this stylish crime thriller that cleverly jumps around in time and features the witty, ironic dialogue and unexpected plot twists that would soon become the pop film culture hallmarks of first-time writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth and Steve Buscemi star in this instant classic

programme.title: Wild Bill
programme.desc: Infamous lawman and gunman of the Old West, Wild Bill Hickok tries to run from his past and his reputation, as he faces his final showdown in Deadwood. Stars Jeff Bridges, Ellen Barkin, John Hurt, Diane Lane, David Arquette and Christina Applegate

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: Meat Loaf: In and Out of Hell
programme.desc: Documentary featuring an intimate profile of American rock legend Meat Loaf, spanning from his childhood of domestic violence, through a decade of rejection by record companies to global fame, bust-ups and a major comeback. Features friends, family and fellow musicians offering a candid, gritty and humorous profile of the overweight bullied kid who became a music icon

programme.title: Holy Man
programme.desc: A stressed-out executive at the Good Buy home shopping channel (Jeff Goldblum) is praying for a miracle that will lift the network's lousy ratings and save his job when, from out of nowhere, an outrageous, self-styled inspirational guru (Eddie Murphy) with a knack for showing up where he isn't exactly wanted, wanders in front of the cameras just long enough to exude the irresistible star quality that will make him the sales-boosting savior the network has been looking for

programme.title: The Spymasters - CIA in the Crosshairs
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the inner workings of the world's most powerful intelligence organization, with unprecedented access to America's spy network, all 12 living CIA directors and top agency operatives, who talk candidly about torture, secret prisons, drone warfare, alleged assassinations and the constant threat of attack, which begs the question: how far should America go to keep us safe? Narrated by Mandy Patinkin ('Homeland')

programme.title: The Facility
programme.desc: In this British horror, a group of strangers involved in a clinical trial for an untested drug find themselves the victim of unexpectedly dangerous side effects

programme.title: Meat Loaf: In and Out of Hell
programme.desc: Documentary featuring an intimate profile of American rock legend Meat Loaf, spanning from his childhood of domestic violence, through a decade of rejection by record companies to global fame, bust-ups and a major comeback. Features friends, family and fellow musicians offering a candid, gritty and humorous profile of the overweight bullied kid who became a music icon

programme.title: Lucky Town
programme.desc: A young woman (Kirsten Dunst) takes a road trip to Las Vegas in search of her dreams and her long-absent father (James Caan), a professional gambler working the casinos. En route, she picks up a convenience store clerk and wannabe cardsharp, who gets them both embroiled in a dangerous game with life threatening stakes

programme.title: Pound of Flesh
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a former black ops agent who has traveled to South Asia to donate a kidney to his dying niece but wakes to find that he is the latest victim of organ theft, forcing him to carve a blood soaked path through the darkest corners of the city to find the culprits, in a race against the clock

programme.title: Jimi Hendrix: Electric Church
programme.desc: Documentary unveiling previously unseen footage of Jimi Hendrix's seminal performance at the 1970 Atlanta Pop Festival playing his greatest hits in front of 300,000 people. Features interviews with Hendrix, and fellow musicians, including Paul McCartney and Mitch Mitchell, who provide new insight into the musician's personality and genius at the juncture of this important cultural gathering, hailed as the 'Southern Woodstock'

programme.title: Knuckleball!
programme.desc: This story of a few good men follows Tim Wakefield and Mets pitcher RA Dickey through the 2011 Major League baseball season as they face struggles unique to the knuckleballer alone. Though scoffed at by peers, discouraged by managers, and overlooked by scouts, these men personify the act of defying conventional wisdom. The knuckler is the everyman of baseball, and in them we see the best versions of ourselves, competing in spite of their failures

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: Danny Glover stars as a brilliant mathematician who returns to his family home after 30 years away to discover that tragic events from his past may be in danger of repeating themselves. Plagued by déjà vu, he is convinced his young neighbor and her mother are doomed to die on the anniversary of his wife and daughter's deaths. Struggling to unlock the pattern, he tries to convince his brother-in-law, a policeman, of the impending tragedy, but the facts don't add up. Is he losing his mind, or running out of time?

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming

programme.title: Young Black Stallion
programme.desc: Family drama following the adventures of a wild young colt that rescues a young girl separated from her father by a band of robbers in the Arabian desert, and the pair form a special bond but is the horse real or just a figment of her imagination?

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: An urban fairy tale set in Manchester about a young boy whose tragic life takes an unexpected turn one Christmas Eve after he meets a mysterious stranger, who takes him on a journey of discovery that will change his destiny. Stars Eddie Izzard

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: An urban fairy tale set in Manchester about a young boy whose tragic life takes an unexpected turn one Christmas Eve after he meets a mysterious stranger, who takes him on a journey of discovery that will change his destiny. Stars Eddie Izzard

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Paper Planes

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Anne Heche and Harrison Ford as a New York magazine editor and a gruff pilot who must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island

programme.title: Keeping Up With The Steins
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood battles his terrible shyness as his father wages his own battle to throw a bar mitzvah party that will outdo his rival. But everything is upended when the boy's estranged grandfather arrives in town, in this satire of materialism

programme.title: Dragon: Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Based on the life and career of Martial Arts superstar Bruce Lee, this biographical drama chronicles his early training in Hong Kong where an altercation led him to flee to the US where he opened a Martial Arts school and landed a big time movie career, all the while running from the demons of his past

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Paper Planes

The show's a fraud, however, and lawyer Richard Goodwin (Rob Morrow) launches a probe that results in scandal. Paul Scofield, David Paymer, Hank Azaria, Christopher McDonald and Mira Sorvino costar in director Robert Redford's acclaimed drama, which earned four Oscar nominations

programme.title: Play It Forward

programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: House Not Home
programme.desc: A gender fluid teenager navigates bullying and violence from peers and rejection from a parent on the journey out of the closet. Directed by Joshua Butler and written by teen Skyler Edge

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After suffering humiliation by a rival crew, a street dancer gathers the best dancers from around the world for a rematch

programme.title: Play It Forward
programme.desc: SHOWTIME Sports presents an emotional story of family, sacrifice and the pursuit of your dreams as candidly told through the lives of legendary NFL tight end and future Hall of Fame inductee Tony Gonzalez and his older brother Chris

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett is a small-town psychic named Annie, a widow using her clairvoyance to support herself and her sons. When she has visions involving the death of a local party girl (Katie Holmes), she suspects Donnie (Keanu Reeves), a violent wife beater. Sure enough, the victim's body is recovered in Donnie's pond, but is Annie interpreting her visions correctly, or is a killer still on the loose?

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Cougars, inc.
programme.desc: When a precocious teenager learns that his mother can't afford to send him to yet another school after he is kicked out, he and his friends start their own escort service for mature women, in order to pay for his tuition. Stars Denise Richards

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this drama about an idealistic California teacher who assigns her at-risk students in a gang-infested high school to writer journals that chronicle their troubled lives. Patrick Dempsey, Imelda Staunton and Scott Glenn costar

programme.title: Dr. T & The Women
programme.desc: Director Robert Altman's ("Gosford Park") comic portrait of a Dallas gynecologist nicknamed Dr. T (Richard Gere), whose career couldn't be better while his personal life falls apart. When his beloved wife (Farrah Fawcett) is hospitalized with a hopeless mental breakdown, Dr. T finds solace in the arms of a golf pro (Helen Hunt) while his cheerleader daughter (Kate Hudson) grapples with her own romantic problem: she's soon to be married but in love with another woman (Liv Tyler). Janine Turner, Tara Reid, Shelley Long and Laura Dern costar

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain

programme.title: Mistress
programme.desc: Robert Wuhl stars as a movie director who's got integrity, vision, and a serious script - but no career. Martin Landau is the sleazy producer who introduces Wuhl to Robert De Niro, Danny Aiello and Eli Wallach - three guys with money who are willing to invest in the movie. There's just one catch: each one wants his girlfriend to be the star. Putting the deal together and keeping the mistress happy turns into a hilarious expose of the truth about Hollywood

programme.title: Lucky Town
programme.desc: A young woman (Kirsten Dunst) takes a road trip to Las Vegas in search of her dreams and her long-absent father (James Caan), a professional gambler working the casinos. programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.title: Duets

Stars Gwyneth Paltrow, Huey Lewis and Paul Giamatti

programme.title: Match

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider

When she discovers that an ancient relic sought by her late father holds the key to power over time, she's quickly strapping on her side arms and hopping the globe, hoping to beat a sinister ancient group called the Illuminati in the quest to recover the artifact. programme.desc: Homer's Odyssey. Homer Simpson (voice of Dan Castellaneta) has never been one of the more distinguished employees at the Springfield Nuclear Power Plant, but he reaches the last straw after a long series of accidents when he crashes an electric cart into a pipe full of radioactive waste -- just as his son Bart (voice of Nancy Cartwright) is touring the plant with his class from school. Homer has no luck finding a new job, and falls into a deep depression; eventually, Homer decides to drown himself by jumping off a bridge, but when his family arrives at the last moment to save him, they're nearly hit by a speeding car. Deciding the intersection near the bridge is dangerous, Homer appears at a Springfield City Council meeting to demand a stop sign be installed; when the council agrees, Homer decides he's found a new purpose in life, and he becomes Springfield's leading safety crusader. Before long, Homer has become affiliated with People Against People for Nuclear Energy, a group looking to close down the Nuclear Power Plant for a number of safety violations. But Homer still needs a job, and he finds himself torn when the plant's owner Mr. Burns (voice of Harry Shearer) offers him a cushy, higher-paying job to shut him up. "Homer's Odyssey" was first aired on January 21, 1990
