programme.title: The Uninvited
programme.desc: Filmmaking duo Thomas and Charles Guard make their feature directorial debuts as the co-directors of this remake of Kim Jee-woon's 2003 Korean film A Tale of Two Sisters. Produced by Asian horror remake king Roy Lee, The Uninvited tells the story of a young girl named Anna (Emily Browning), who was admitted into a mental hospital following the death of her biological mother. Returning home some time later, Anna is shocked to discover that her father (David Strathairn) has recently gotten engaged to Rachel (Elizabeth Banks), her mother's former nurse. Anna's suspicions about Rachel are soon confirmed when her mother reaches out from the beyond to deliver a stark warning, prompting the young girl and her sister (Arielle Kebbel) to try and convince their father that Rachel is not who she appears to be. As the situation in the once-peaceful household rapidly begins to deteriorate, Rachel's true colors finally begin boiling to the surface

programme.title: Homegrown: The Counter-Terror Dilemma

programme.title: Making of 'Jason Bourne'

programme.title: Trouble With the Curve
programme.desc: An aging baseball scout (Clint Eastwood) with failing sight hits the road with his estranged daughter (Amy Adams) to pursue a promising young ballplayer, and they learn just how much they have in common as they make their way from Georgia to North Carolina in this sports drama produced and directed by frequent Eastwood collaborator Robert Lorenz. For decades, Gus Lobel (Eastwood) has been one of the best scouts in Major League Baseball. But these days his eyes just aren't what they used to be, and as a phenomenal young batter enters the draft, the owners of the Atlanta Braves cast a shadow of doubt over Gus' judgment. Meanwhile, his daughter Mickey ( Adams) is an aspiring partner at a major Atlanta law firm. In the wake of his wife's death, Gus sent Mickey away, and their relationship has been strained ever since. But she knows a thing or two about baseball, and recognizing that her father's job is in jeopardy, she decides to help him -- even at the risk of derailing her own career. Now, throwing caution to the wind (and ignoring her gruff father's objections), Mickey joins Gus for a scouting trip that could keep him in the game until he's ready to retire, as well as repair a father/daughter relationship that once seemed all but lost. Justin Timberlake, John Goodman, Robert Patrick, and Matthew Lillard co-star

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Gina Norris is a long way from the Barbershop - she's moved from Chicago to Atlanta so her daughter can attend a prestigious music school, and she's made a name for herself at a posh salon with her cutting-edge hairstyles. But when her egotistical boss takes credit for her work, she leaves the salon with the shampoo girl in tow to open a shop of her own. Gina buys a rundown salon and inherits a motley group of headstrong stylists, a colorful clientele, and a sexy piano-playing electrician. It's a rocky road to fulfilling her dreams, but you can't keep a good woman down

programme.title: Hearts in Atlantis
programme.desc: One of the short stories in a best-selling collection by author Stephen King becomes this mystery adapted for director Scott Hicks by screenwriter William Goldman, who previously transformed a King story into a box-office hit (Misery, 1990). In the summer of 1960, young Bobby Garfield (Anton Yelchin) is sharing adventures with his best friends Carol (Mika Boorem) and Sully (Will Rothhaar) when an enigmatic lodger named Ted Brautigan (Anthony Hopkins) rents a room in his family's boarding house. Bobby's self-absorbed, widowed mother Liz (Hope Davis) couldn't care less about her son, so Bobby, who is being tormented by local bullies, quickly befriends the otherworldly Ted, becoming his confidante, and reading the paper to him to save the aging man's failing eyesight. Soon, Bobby learns that Ted possesses supernatural gifts, has a haunted past, and is being pursued by sinister men whose intentions are unclear. Hearts in Atlantis co-stars David Morse, who appeared in the previous King adaptation The Green Mile (1999), as the adult Bobby

programme.title: Making of 'The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel'

However, his dreams are shattered as his mother, trying to kick a drug addiction and get their lives back on track, takes him to live in a country estate to an old aquaintence. There he encounters a totally different tribe: the super rich

programme.title: The Iceman Confesses: Secrets of a Mafia Hitman
programme.desc: An update on convicted killer Richard Kuklinski, who was the subject of a 1992 documentary. Jailed in 1988, he later admitted to murdering more than 100 people. Included: interviews with Kuklinski and law-enforcement officials; crime reenactments; home movies; archival photos

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival Pat Candy (Billy Bob Thornton), who is working on the opponent's campaign and is also looking for every opportunity to antagonize Jane. The film is loosely based on the 2005 documentary of the same name by Rachel Boynton. Directed by David Gordon Green (Pineapple Express, George Washington). Produced by Oscar-winners George Clooney and Grant Heslov

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A one-night Vegas wedding between Jack and Joy ends up in court after he wins $3m. The judge rules that they can only split the cash if they stay married for six months

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teens awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment in this thrilling adaptation of the best-selling YA novel. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organization hint at a sinister agenda

programme.title: Maze Runner: Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: This satirical comedy starring Sandra Bullock as a political consultant gives viewers an inside look at the high-stakes, win-at-all-costs world of politics. Bullock stars as "Calamity" Jane Bodine, who is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival Pat Candy (Billy Bob Thornton), who is working on the opponent's campaign and is also looking for every opportunity to antagonize Jane. The film is loosely based on the 2005 documentary of the same name by Rachel Boynton. Directed by David Gordon Green (Pineapple Express, George Washington). Produced by Oscar-winners George Clooney and Grant Heslov

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: No additional information is available

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Coverage of the Republican National Convention in Cleveland. Panelists include filmmaker Michael Moore, political correspondent Joy Reid and columnist Dan Savage

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: A Dark Crate. Naz waits to be arraigned at Rikers Island, where a particular inmate is crucial to his fate

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women

programme.title: Same Time, Next Year
programme.desc: Comedy based on Bernard Slade's play about a couple who meet annually for trysts

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this hysterical big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party

programme.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
programme.desc: John Carpenter's comedy thriller stars Chevy Chase as Nick Halloway who, caught up in a freak accident, becomes invisible. Forced to flee the CIA, who see him as an outstanding asset, his only help is anthropologist Alice Monroe who, as well as providing the love interest, helps him to come to terms with his plight

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: Dana Carvey is a private eye who wakes up every morning without a clue where, or who he is. It's like Memento, but with more belly laughs

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Rusty Griswold, the youngest child from 1983's National Lampoon's Vacation is all grown up with a family of his own and fond childhood memories of a certain family road trip to Walley World, "America's Favorite Family Fun Park." Like his father, Clark (Chevy Chase), Rusty wants to forge closer bonds with his own family - wife Debbie (Christina Applegate) and boys James and Kevin (Skyler Gisondo and Steele Stebbins) - so he buys a souped-up Albanian van and convinces them to set off on their own crazy cross-country jaunt to Walley World. Directed by John Francis Daley and Jonathan M. Goldstein

programme.title: Igby Goes Down
programme.desc: A personal tale about a 17 year old misfit boy who tries to cope with his mother's cancer, his father's insanity and the values and expectations of the old money East Coast society. Truly an intellectual, Igby is a modern day Holden Caulfield of "Catcher in the Rye". Unfortunately the world he lives in is far away from the high expectations he holds for it

programme.title: One Night Stand
programme.desc: Lew Schneider. Lew Schneider comments on New York City, appliances, marriage, parenthood and religion. Taped in Miami Beach

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Government agent Will Smith pairs up with Kevin Kline to foil Kenneth Branagh's dastardly plot to kill the President. Western adventure with Salma Hayek. Mild violence/sex. (1999)(102 mins)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Divine comedy sequel to 2003's "Bruce Almighty." A hilarious Steve Carell reprises his role as newscaster (now Congressman) Evan Baxter, who's summoned by God to build an ark. Morgan Freeman once again takes on the role of the deity. Directed by Tom Shadyac, who also helmed the original. Lauren Graham costars as Evan's disbelieving wife. Wanda Sykes, John Goodman, Molly Shannon, John Michael Higgins

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: A black yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra-hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a cool young mail clerk on how to approach her

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in Barry Sonnenfeld's brilliant film of Elmore Leonard's comedy of manners as a debt collector for the Mob who winds up in Los Angeles where he discovers his skills are just those required of a movie producer. With Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito, Dennis Farina

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Rusty Griswold, the youngest child from 1983's National Lampoon's Vacation is all grown up with a family of his own and fond childhood memories of a certain family road trip to Walley World, "America's Favorite Family Fun Park." Like his father, Clark (Chevy Chase), Rusty wants to forge closer bonds with his own family - wife Debbie (Christina Applegate) and boys James and Kevin (Skyler Gisondo and Steele Stebbins) - so he buys a souped-up Albanian van and convinces them to set off on their own crazy cross-country jaunt to Walley World. Directed by John Francis Daley and Jonathan M. Goldstein

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Lt. Gen. Michael Flynn (USA Ret.) and actor America Ferrera are the interview guests. The panelists are political scientist Ian Bremmer, journalist Ana Marie Cox and former representative Jack Kingston

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Channing Tatum and Alex Pettyfer star in director Steven Soderbergh's drama about male strippers in Florida

programme.title: Not Another Teen Movie
programme.desc: Can wise janitor Mr T help dim sportsman Jake turn hippie Janey into the prom queen? Or will jock Austin spoil the party? Teen comedy spoof with scattergun gags aimed at Clueless, American Pie, The Breakfast Club and She's All That

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: Ice Cube returns as South Central L.A. slacker Craig Jones for this raucous sequel to 1995's "Friday." Jones hightails it to his lottery-winning uncle's suburban crib to hide from an escaped con he helped put in jail in the first film. Tom "Tiny" Lister Jr., Mike Epps, John Witherspoon

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: Richard Pryor stars as Montgomery Brewster, a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300m. But he can only get it if he can waste $30m in just 30 days without anyone knowing he's doing it, without investing it and without banking it. And his best friend John Candy is no help, trying to make his friend's money earn interest... Walter Hill, better known for tough dramas, turns his hand to comedy for this much-loved and filmed stage play, scripted in this case by Timothy Harris and Herschel Weingrod of Trading Places fame

programme.title: Wagons East!
programme.desc: An alcoholic wagonmaster leads a group of discontented pioneers away from the Old West

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: From the producers of Independence Day and Godzilla. Spilled toxic waste results in giant jumping, weaving and trapdoor spiders that attack a small town in this fun comedy starring David Arquette, Kari Wührer and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this hysterical big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Directed by Jonathan Frakes and based on the '60s British television series of the same name, Thunderbirds chronicles the intergalactic exploits of the Tracy family. Set in 2010, the world looks toward the mysterious Tracy Island when mere international security is not enough; the remote South Pacific island not only houses former astronaut and lifelong entrepreneur Jeff Tracy (Bill Paxton) and his five sons, but also serves as headquarters for the top-secret International Rescue organization. The unthinkable happens, however, when an insidious criminal mastermind known only as "The Hood" (Ben Kingsley) manages to get past the island's innumerable security measures and attempts to take over International Rescue. His goal: stealing the organization's five most advanced rescue vehicles, each of which was designed to accomplish a specific task, and using them for his own agenda. With Jeff and his four eldest sons deployed on a mission, there's only one person with any hope of stopping the takeover -- Jeff's youngest son, Alan (Brady Corbet), who vows to save his family and keep the Thunderbirds alive

programme.title: Super Troopers
programme.desc: "Police Academy" meets "Animal House" in this raucous romp written by and starring the Broken Lizard comedy troupe. Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Paul Soter, Steve Lemme and Erik Stolhanske play Vermont state police officers battling crime and sparring with the local cops, who are trying to get them ousted. Lynda Carter, Daniel von Bargen. Chandrasekhar also directed

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: The folks behind the popular "Scary Movie," "Epic Movie" and "Date Movie" are back, taking even more comic potshots at hit movies like "300" and at overexposed celebrities. The loose plot features Sean Maguire and Kevin Sorbo as two Spartan leaders who face off against the vast Persian army. Carmen Electra, Ken Davitian

programme.title: Eulogy
programme.desc: Writer/director Michael Clancy makes his feature film debut with the black comedy Eulogy. Zooey Deschanel plays Kate Collins, an unhappy college student who is made even more unhappy when her grandfather (Rip Torn) dies. Even though the entire family hates each other, they reunite at the home of Grandma Collins (Piper Laurie). Among other family members, Kate observes a war between her washed-up actor dad, Daniel (Hank Azaria); her lesbian Aunt Lucy (Kelly Preston); her wound-up Uncle Skip (Ray Romano); and her strict Aunt Alice (Debra Winger). Tensions escalate and family secrets are ultimately revealed. Kate is also inundated with the eulogy-writing duties, as she's the only one capable of such a task. Meanwhile, she reunites with old flame Ryan Carmichael (Jesse Bradford). Eulogy premiered at the Sundance Film Festival in 2004

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton has a blast as the foul-mouthed safecracker who dresses up as a department store Santa, then robs the joint

programme.title: Super Troopers
programme.desc: "Police Academy" meets "Animal House" in this raucous romp written by and starring the Broken Lizard comedy troupe. Jay Chandrasekhar, Kevin Heffernan, Paul Soter, Steve Lemme and Erik Stolhanske play Vermont state police officers battling crime and sparring with the local cops, who are trying to get them ousted. The loose plot features Sean Maguire and Kevin Sorbo as two Spartan leaders who face off against the vast Persian army. Carmen Electra, Ken Davitian

programme.title: Wagons East!
programme.desc: Comedy western about a wagon train boss who is hired to lead a bunch of fed-up pioneers back to the East. But first they must get past the gunslingers paid to stop them by a railway baron who reckons that others could copy the Eastward trend. John Candy died before the film's completion

programme.title: Making of 'Everest'
programme.desc: A look at "Everest," a 2016 drama based on the attempts by two groups to climb Mount Everest in 1996. The film stars Jason Clarke, Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin and Robin Wright, and is directed by Baltasar Kormákur

programme.title: Hoot
programme.desc: In this charming version of the bestselling family book, kids take on crooked politicians and greedy developers to save a population of endangered burrowing owls threatened by a construction project. Logan Lerman, Brie Larson, Cody Linley, Luke Wilson. Directed by Wil Shriner

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: Bubble Picture Mirror. Topics include "Bubble," "Picture" and "Mirror."

programme.desc: Dress-Up Club. Prairie Dawn plays dress-up and learns it's a game for both boys and girls

programme.desc: Mi Amiguita Rosita. Rosita write a book about living on Sesame Street and what it means to be Mexican. Gina Rodriguez is the guest star

programme.desc: First Step Last. Topics include "First," "Step" and "Last."

programme.desc: Beauty and the Beast. This version of "Beauty and the Beast" is set in Africa and features the voice of Gregory Hines as the hideous creature who tries the win the heart of an enchanting maiden (Vanessa Williams). Other voice talent includes Debbie Allen and Paul Winfield

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Snow White. This adaptation of "Snow White" is set in the American Southwest, and all the characters are Native Americans. Buffy Sainte-Marie provides the voice of the Spirit and performs two songs. Other voices include Graham Greene and Michael Horse

programme.title: Like Mike
programme.desc: Teen rap star Lil' Bow Wow wows 'em in this bouncy sports fantasy. He plays Calvin Cambridge, a 13-year-old orphan who finds a pair of magic sneakers. With his fantastic new footwear, Calvin becomes a basketball phenom, and soon he's lighting it up for the local NBA franchise. Morris Chestnut, Jonathan Lipnicki, Anne Meara, Robert Forster, Crispin Glover

programme.desc: Forget about the arena, because in this sequel to the 2002 slam-dunk basketball hit Like Mike, it's all about the quest to become the King of Concrete. Jerome Jenkins Jr. is a pint-sized street-ball player with larger-than-life dreams of dominating the open-air court. Vertically challenged, uncoordinated, and decidedly lacking in speed, Jerome fails to earn the respect of his peers on the court until he discovers a mysterious pair of sneakers that instil him with the power to make his dreams of winning become reality

programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global superstardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: A lazy panda must learn the ways of kung fu to defend his homeland from attack

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: An ancient struggle between two extraterrestrial clans, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a young teenager

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: A scientist embarks upon a time-travelling adventure, experiencing the battles and destruction of several world wars before settling in a seemingly Edenic community in 802,701 AD. But while the citizens' idyllic existence is somewhat vacuous, with little independence or individual thought, a second community - a group of underground cannibals - steals his time machine, leaving him trapped in their dangerous world

programme.title: Like Mike 2: Streetball
programme.desc: Forget about the arena, because in this sequel to the 2002 slam-dunk basketball hit Like Mike, it's all about the quest to become the King of Concrete. Jerome Jenkins Jr. is a pint-sized street-ball player with larger-than-life dreams of dominating the open-air court. Vertically challenged, uncoordinated, and decidedly lacking in speed, Jerome fails to earn the respect of his peers on the court until he discovers a mysterious pair of sneakers that instill him with the power to make his dreams of winning become reality. Now, as Jerome's newfound talents send him rocketing to street stardom and his swelling ego eclipses his youthful sense of wonder, it's up to the street-ball superstar's family and friends to show him what it really means to be a winner on the court as well as off

programme.desc: The Princess and the Pea. In a Korean version of "The Princess and the Pea," a queen (voice of Margaret Cho) becomes a royal pain to a princess. Other voices include Steve Park, Keone Young, Bianco Min, Karen Lew and Heidi Ahn

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Pinocchio. An African-American accented "Pinocchio" features the voice of Will Smith as the wooden boy and Charles S. Dutton as his human papa, the toymaker Ol' George. Other voice talent: Chris Rock and Della Reese

programme.title: Hoot
programme.desc: Wil Shriner's family film, based on Carl Hiaasen's novel, stars Logan Lerman as Roy Eberhardt, who, thanks to his father's job, is at his eighth school in six years, this time in Florida. There, he makes friends with Beatrice and Mullet Fingers. Mullet is involved in low-level sabotage to stop a chain restaurant building on a nesting site used by rare burrowing owls and the other two join his in his eco-battle against inept contractor Curly and his greedy boss Muckle

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Jim Henson's colourful characters re-tell the classic Charles Dickens tale, throwing in a few musical numbers along the way

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: Animated misadventures of a worker bee who alights from the hive to befriend a human being

programme.title: Goodnight Moon & Other Sleepytime Tales
programme.desc: This HBO special features the classic children's tale Goodnight Moon by Margaret Wise Brown and Clement Hurd. The story is brought to life with vivid animation and narration by Susan Sarandon. Also included in this special nighttime collection for kids are Tony Bennett singing "Hit the Road to Dreamland," Lauryn Hill singing "Hush Little Baby," and comedian Billy Crystal reading the classic Mercer Mayer tale There's a Monster in My Closet

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: Mighty Bright Fight. Jessica and Manny are able to set aside their differences when the learn they both like the "Mighty Bright Knight" comic book

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: No additional information is available

programme.desc: A dog and a cat give vocabulary lessons in English and Spanish

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: (1994) Patrick Read Johnson's comedy, scripted by John Hughes, stars Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley as Eddie, Norby and Veeko, three inept criminals who kidnap Baby Bink, the son of a rich Chicago family. But while they are negotiating the ransom, Baby Bink escapes and begins to make his way back home. As the trio chase him, he manages to avoid all dangers, only for his pursuers to run straight into them. The film owes much to cartoon humour such as Road Runner , where falls and explosions are slapstick rather than fatal, while the interaction of the three criminals carries Hughes' trademark quick fire humour. Premiere

programme.title: Hoot
programme.desc: Wil Shriner's family film, based on Carl Hiaasen's novel, stars Logan Lerman as Roy Eberhardt, who, thanks to his father's job, is at his eighth school in six years, this time in Florida. There, he makes friends with Beatrice and Mullet Fingers. Mullet is involved in low-level sabotage to stop a chain restaurant building on a nesting site used by rare burrowing owls and the other two join his in his eco-battle against inept contractor Curly and his greedy boss Muckle

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Animated adventure. A penguin is cast out by his colony because he is unable to sing, but his tap-dancing skills and new friends enable him to make a triumphant return. Featuring the voices of Elijah Wood, Brittany Murphy, Robin Williams, Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman

programme.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
programme.desc: The Jonas Brothers burn up the big screen in this 3-D rockumentary chronicling their "Burning Up" concert tour. The film features exclusive behind-the-scenes footage, a brand-new song, and special guest performances by Taylor Swift and Demi Lovato. Directed by Bruce Hendricks ("Hannah Montana/Miley Cyrus: Best of Both Worlds Concert")

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teens awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment in this thrilling adaptation of the best-selling YA novel. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organization hint at a sinister agenda

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: Paul Thomas Anderson adapts Thomas Pynchon's celebrated detective novel in this Annapurna Pictures production. Joaquin Phoenix stars as Larry "Doc" Sportello, a pot-smoking private eye at the tail end of the psychedelic '60s who investigates a kidnapping case involving his old flame Shasta Fay Hepworth (Katherine Waterston) and her missing sugar daddy Mickey Wolfmann (Eric Roberts), a powerful real-estate mogul. In the course of his investigation Doc butts heads with Lt. Det. Christian F. "Bigfoot" Bjornsen (Josh Brolin), a part-time actor with a palpable distain for the free-love generation, and a reputation for committing civil-rights violations. Later, as clues to Wolfmann's disappearance begin to suggest a conspiracy involving the FBI and a mysterious underworld syndicate known as the Golden Fang, Doc seeks the help of his lawyer Sauncho Smilax, Esq. (Benicio Del Toro) and Deputy D.A. Penny Kimball (Reese Witherspoon). Meanwhile, Doc also agrees to search for Coy Harlingen (Owen Wilson), a reportedly deceased saxophone player who may not be as dead as rumors suggest, and who seems somehow tied to the ongoing Wolfmann investigation. Martin Short, Jena Malone, and Joanna Newsom co-star

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Jean Claude Van Damme headlines this taut and exciting actioner. Van Damme is Darren McCord, who as the story begins is seen trapped in a blazing building, trying to save a child. The experience is traumatic and two years later, he has become fire marshal of the Pittsburgh Civic Arena. One night he and his two kids are attending a play-off hockey game between the Penguins and the Blackhawks. Also attending the game is the vice president of the US. He has no idea that he is the target of an assassination conspiracy that is to occur that very night. The leader of the killers is Joshua Foss. The villains stage a raid and begin holding the entire coliseum hostage. The crooks will only free the hostages if they receive $1.7 billion from the government in three increments at the end of each period. If their demands aren't met, the bad-guys will detonate the 10 bombs they have stashed beneath the arena. Now it is up to McCord to find those bombs and stops them

programme.title: Unhitched
programme.desc: A would-be writer in London tries to start a new chapter in his life when he meets the woman of his dreams—who also happens to be his friend's fiancée

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of a football coach who must overcome hostility from colleagues and players alike in order to lead his racially integrated team to glory. When three 1971 Virginian high schools merge, the already tense relationships are exaggerated by the appointment of an African-American head coach as the team becomes the symbol for the divided community

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Mickey Rourke stars as a former professional wrestling superstar fallen on hard times and grappling with a rocky personal life while looking for a chance at a comeback in the ring. Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood. Features cameos by a number of WWE wrestlers. Directed by Darren Aronofsky

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: A heroin trafficker whose wife was abducted and murdered hires a haunted private investigator to track down the men who killed her in this brooding crime drama starring Liam Neeson. Matt Scudder (Neeson) was an NYPD cop having a quiet drink in a Washington Heights bar when a pair of armed robbers came in guns blazing. Giving chase, Scudder kills the robbers in the street, though a stray bullet turns a heroic moment tragic. Devastated, Scudder subsequently goes to work as an unlicensed private detective, working just outside of the law and surviving on generous gifts offered in exchange for his services. Now, tasked with rooting out the sadistic thugs who brutally murdered the wife of a wealthy drug dealer (Dan Stevens), Scudder scours the bars and back alleys of New York City in search of his elusive targets -- and the closer he gets, the more apparent it becomes that they are something much more sinister than your typical kidnappers

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Madonna's hubby Guy Ritchie directs the second of his smash hit cockney comedy crime capers. And where else will you see Brad Pitt teamed up with Vinnie Jones and Mike 'Frank Butcher' Reid? Three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Meanwhile, two friends team up with a pugilistic gypsy to fix a boxing match. When a gangster from New York arrives on the scene, things really start to get complicated

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A furloughed convict teams with a joint American-Chinese anticyber-theft task force to root out a hacker based in Southeast Asia

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: The mythical story of Vlad the Impaler's transformation into Dracula is revealed. As the Turkish invade Romania, Vlad goes to the greatest of lengths to fight for his homeland, even if it means selling his soul and becoming forever doomed as a creature of the night

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Mickey Rourke stars as a former professional wrestling superstar fallen on hard times and grappling with a rocky personal life while looking for a chance at a comeback in the ring. Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood. Features cameos by a number of WWE wrestlers. Directed by Darren Aronofsky

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) and his tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: Prepare for serious thrills as a cop pursues a female android that escaped from a hedonistic resort where people live out their wildest fantasies. Meanwhile, the owner of the resort dispatches a band of mercenaries to eliminate the android first

programme.title: Broad Street Bullies
programme.desc: Documentary on the Philadelphia Flyers of the 1970s and the aggressive style of play that won them back-to-back Stanley Cups. Beloved in their home city and despised elsewhere, the Flyers were one of the most polarizing champions in sports. Among those interviewed are Bobby Clarke; Bill Barber; Dave Schultz; Bill Clement; and Gary Dornhoefer

programme.title: The Last Castle
programme.desc: A three-star general who is sent to military prison puts his leadership skills to work and unites the prisoners in order to defeat a corrupt warden

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as maths genius John Nash, who finds that paranoia and schizophrenia are problems he may never solve. Acclaimed drama. Mature themes/flashing images. (2001)(136 mins)

programme.title: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
programme.desc: Richard Marin and Thomas Chong's misadventures as bumbling musicians

programme.title: Gridlock'd
programme.desc: A social satire about two helpless junkies who face an endless stream of red tape as they attempt to get into a rehab program

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends inadvertently stir a dark force while attempting to contact their late pal through a Ouija board

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: In this psychological thriller based on actual events, a disgraced journalist plays a game of cat and mouse with an accused murderer who assumed his identity while on the run

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: Joy Ride
programme.desc: College student Lewis Thomas takes a trip across country to pick up his dream girl, Venna. On the way he is joined by his brother Fuller and together they play a practical joke on a trucker over a CB radio. Now the trucker wants revenge..

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: In this psychological thriller based on actual events, a disgraced journalist plays a game of cat and mouse with an accused murderer who assumed his identity while on the run

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Synthetic drugs give a woman superhuman powers, which she uses to strike back against her captors

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Jason Reitman's comedy drama stars Oscar-nominee Ellen Page as Juno McGuff, 16 and pregnant after an encounter with on-off boyfriend Paulie Bleeker. She tells her father Mac and mother Bren she intends to have the baby and then hand it over for adoption. In the pages of the PennySaver, she finds childless couple Vanessa and Mark Loring who look like the ideal couple. But, as the months progress and her stomach swells, Juno begins to doubt both them and her course of action. Oscar-winning Diablo Cody's whip-smart script keeps the laughs coming and the action moving in one of the most lauded movies of recent years

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: After twenty years, Laurie Strode, now the headmistress of a private school, is still struggling with the memories of the maniac killer, Michael Myers - when suddenly he reappears - with a vengeance..

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Best friends, a priest (Norton) and a rabbi (Stiller) both fall in love with the same girl (Elfman). However, neither of the men can pursue the relationship due to their religious beliefs: the priest cannot break his vow of celibacy and the rabbi cannot marry her since she is not Jewish

programme.title: Saving Grace
programme.desc: Brenda Blethyn is the widow left with debt problems. The solution: a greenhouse of marijuana. An appealing, easygoing comedy with a modern Ealing edge

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: A dimwitted criminal kidnaps a baby that belongs to a wealthy local businessman in order to make his depressed wife who is unable to have children of her own happy. Soon he finds himself on the run from the police, old criminal acquaintances, and a mysterious motorcycle-riding madman

programme.title: How to Let Go of the World and Love All the Things Climate Can't Change
programme.desc: A look at communities around the world that have been harshly impacted by the effects of climate change. This documentary also spotlights inspiring efforts to create a greener, more-sustainable existence

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Sonny (Dev Patel) prepares to expand the Best Exotic Marigold Hotel for the Elderly and Beautiful while planning his impending wedding to Sunaina (Tena Desae) in this sequel that reteams director John Madden and screenwriter Ol Parker. As the contented residents of the hotel begin settling into their new lives, Sonny strives to balance the demands of planning his wedding with the responsibilities of purchasing a new property. Meanwhile, new guests Guy (Richard Gere) and Lavinia (Tamsin Greig) find themselves in a predicament after arriving at the hotel to find there is only one vacancy. Perhaps with a little innovation new co-manager Muriel (Maggie Smith) can find a means of accommodating the hotel's latest occupants, but she'll have her work cut out for her as Douglas (Bill Nighy) and Evelyn (Judi Dench) begin their new careers in Jaipur while flirting with the idea of a serious romance -- like Norman (Ronald Pickup) and Carol (Diana Hardcastle). With romance in the air it's no wonder that Madge (Celia Imrie) has her pick of handsome suitors, and as stalwart Muriel safeguards the many secrets of the vivacious residents, Sonny and Sunaina learn that planning a traditional Indian wedding can be a true test of commitment

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A mousy college freshman living on her own in New York City meets Brooke, her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: Four friends in their 20s drift through life in the streets and bars of Manhattan's Little Italy. Often it's a bleak existence. When they're not hustling a crooked buck, the four drink, chase women and brawl — sometimes with each other

programme.title: The Piano
programme.desc: Jane Campion's superb Gothic romance tells the sensual and erotic story of Ada, a mute Scottish widow who is sent off with her young daughter to an arranged marriage with a settler in the harsh world of mid 19th century New Zealand. Ada's voice and life are embodied in her beloved piano, which is abandoned by her new husband and rescued by the neighbour, who begins a sensual courtship as she plays the piano

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: A priest whose life is threatened during confession tries to comfort his delicate-minded daughter as the day of his scheduled execution draws near. Meanwhile, he struggles to summon the courage to face his ultimate fate

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) never wanted to take over the family business, a barbershop on the south side of Chicago. Disgusted with the shop's crime-ridden neighborhood, and caught up in his moneymaking schemes, one morning Calvin decides to sell the shop to the shady Lester (Keith David). Chastised by his pregnant wife, Jennifer (Jazsmin Lewis), for his rash decision, Calvin spends the day cutting heads at the shop, and starts to understand the importance of the legacy his grandfather and father have left to him. The bickering barbers include Eddie (Cedric the Entertainer), the old-timer with his own unique perspective on black life; Terri (rapper Eve in her film debut), a hot-tempered woman with a trifling boyfriend; Jimmy (Sean Patrick Thomas), a college educated snob; Ricky (Michael Ealy) a reformed criminal; Isaac (Troy Garity, the son of Jane Fonda and Tom Hayden), a white B-Boy, whom no one is ready to let cut their hair; and Dinka (Leonard Howze), a recent African immigrant who's too shy to express his feelings for Terri. Calvin learns to appreciate them all, and discovers that the place where they work is more than just a place to get a haircut -- it's a meeting place for the neighborhood, a place where folks can speak their minds and find out what's happening. Calvin gradually changes his mind about selling the shop, but it may be too late. Meanwhile, a bumbling thief, J.D. (Anthony Anderson) spends a painful day trying to crack open the ATM he's stolen from the grocery store across the street. Barbershop was directed by Tim Story and produced by George Tillman Jr. and Robert Teitel, the producers of Soul Food. Barbershop had its world premiere at the 2002 Urbanworld Film Festival

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Flamboyant Hollywood remake of the 1979 French farce La Cage Aux Folles. When his son's conservative future in-laws come to town, gay club owner Armand and his cross-dressing partner Albert are forced to play husband and wife

programme.title: Back on Board: Greg Louganis
programme.desc: A documentary profiling the four-time Olympic gold-medal winning diver and one of America's first openly gay athletes. The film chronicles his successes, the discrimination he has faced, his struggles for financial security and his return to the sport

programme.title: Making of 'Spy'
programme.desc: A look at "Spy," a 2015 comedy about a CIA analyst thrust into the line of duty to track down a ruthless arms dealer. The film stars Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham and Rose Byrne, and is written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: John Travolta stars in Barry Sonnenfeld's brilliant film of Elmore Leonard's comedy of manners as a debt collector for the Mob who winds up in Los Angeles where he discovers his skills are just those required of a movie producer. With Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito, Dennis Farina

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Coming-of-age comedy concerning four high-school friends who vow to lose their virginity by prom night

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The horny teen heroes of American Pie (1999) return for further raunchy antics in this comedy sequel written by the first film's creator, Adam Herz. Returning home following their freshman year of college, old friends Jim (Jason Biggs), Kevin (Thomas Ian Nicholas), Oz (Chris Klein), Finch (Eddie Kaye Thomas), and Stifler (Seann William Scott) rent a summer house on Lake Michigan where they hope to score romantically. However, complications ensue due to Jim's relative lack of experience, requiring an interlude with a fellow student and a visit to his old friend Michelle (Alyson Hanigan), who's now a band camp counselor, all in preparation for the return of Nadia (Shannon Elizabeth). In the meantime, Oz is separated from Heather (Mena Suvari) by a trip abroad, Finch has another encounter with Stifler's mom (Jennifer Coolidge), and Jim's dad (Eugene Levy) is as clueless as ever about his son's love life. Director J.B. Rogers served as first assistant director on the first film and made his directorial debut with Say It Isn't So (2001)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Enter the Temple. Spencer pursues a big client who's already represented by a powerful rival; Ricky mulls his next move; Tracy lobbies for a bigger role at work; Reggie feels undervalued by Vernon

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is on a quest to discover his true identity, and how he became a consummate killer, in the third entry of this series

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: Ryan Gosling tries his hand at writing and directing with this fantasy thriller starring Christina Hendricks as a financially strapped single mother struggling to protect her kids in a dreamlike city

programme.title: Murderous Intent
programme.desc: Gripping psychological study delving into the well-constructed murder of an upper-class British schoolboy (Tom Sturridge) by a classmate (Eddie Redmayne). Strangely, evidence suggests that the minds of the two young men may have become one. Toni Collette, who also serves as an executive producer, costars as the forensic psychologist investigating the case who discovers a disturbing connection between the two. Written and directed by Gregory J. Read

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Former covert operative Bryan Mills must race to protect his daughter while tracking down the criminals who framed him for killing his ex-wife. Meanwhile, the FBI, the CIA and the police are hot on his trail

programme.title: Renaissance Man
programme.desc: Comedy about a former ad executive who is forced by circumstances to take a temporary job teaching bottom-of-the-pile recruits at an Army training camp. Because of their below-average reading and writing skills, the youngsters seem unlikely to be accepted by the Army, but their new teacher turns out to possess a gift for motivating his students

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: The 1947 holiday classic Miracle on 34th Street is transplanted to the 1990s with few changes in this family-oriented remake. The screenplay by the prolific John Hughes sticks close to the original outline, centering on Macy's executive Dorey Walker (Elizabeth Perkins) and her young daughter Susan (Mara Wilson), neither of whom much believes in the spirit of Christmas. Dorey is in charge of hiring Macy's Santas, including an old man named Kriss Kringle (Richard Attenborough). He does a remarkably convincing job, and he soon reveals that he actually believes himself to be Santa Claus. The authorities threaten to place the old man in an insane asylum, but a young lawyer comes to his defense. Meanwhile, Dorey and Susan find their own defenses melting and become reacquainted with the power of faith. Hughes and director Les Mayfield add a few modern touches, making Susan slightly more cynical and adding the requisite soulless corporate villains. Viewers familiar with the original may still prefer Edmund Gwenn's original Kris Kringle and consider the remake unnecessary, although the newer version reflects enough of the earlier film's spirit to prove entertaining to modern family audiences

programme.title: The World According to Garp
programme.desc: Based on the John Irving novel, this film chronicles the life of T S Garp and his mother, Jenny. Whilst Garp sees himself as a "serious" writer, Jenny writes a feminist manifesto at an opportune time and finds herself as a magnet for all manner of distressed women

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: In this gothic romance set at the turn of the 20th century, a mysterious stranger named Sir Thomas Sharpe (Tom Hiddleston) woos young author Edith Cushing (Mia Wasikowska) and brings her as his bride to his mansion atop a clay mountain in Cumbria, England. There, Edith meets Sharpe's strange and secretive sister Lucille (Jessica Chastain), and learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets that will force her to fight for her sanity and her very life. Directed by Guillermo del Toro

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: The true-life tale of Louis Zamperini, the Olympic track star who survived a plane crash in WWII, and later fought for his life against nature and as a Japanese prisoner of war

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Queen Witch who has returned from the dead in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance

programme.title: Barb Wire
programme.desc: A bounty hunter's town and business are under siege by warring factions in this futuristic fantasy about comic-book babe Barb Wire

programme.title: We Don't Live Here Anymore
programme.desc: Jack is married to Terry but is having an affair with Edith, the wife of his friend Hank, with whom he goes jogging. It's an affair riddled with guilt and exhilaration. It's also an affair that takes its toll on Jack's home life

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: Four friends get in over their heads when they become indebted to a dangerous crime boss. Now, they must kidnap a beloved member of a rival kingpin's family in order to erase their debt, and do so without getting caught or killed in the process

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: A former mob hit man is haunted by his life of crime. But when his estranged son is marked to be killed, he's forced to turn against his former employers in this white-knuckle thriller

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day

programme.title: The Glass House
programme.desc: Ruby and Rhett, two teenage girls lose their parents in a car crash and are placed under the care of a childless couple. Things take a turn, when the girls find out the truth about their parents death

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Affable everyman Walter Sparrow is given a second-hand detective novel 'The Number 23' for his birthday, but grows increasingly obsessed with the parallels he sees between his life and that of the book's protagonist

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: While travelling through the Outback, an American travel writer and a group of tourists are terrorised by an enormous killer crocodile

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: This fantasy action film stars Justin Chatwin as Goku, an 18-year-old whose grandfather gives him a Dragonball. The old man tells him that when a person combines all seven Dragonballs in the world, that person can have a wish granted. After an attack on his grandfather, Goku sets off with friends to find the other Dragonballs and save the world

programme.title: One Missed Call
programme.desc: A series of small town residents are dispatched in various gruesome ways. The one link between them is their cellphones

programme.title: Annie Hall
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, 'Annie Hall' is Woody Allen's supreme masterpiece. Allen himself stars alongside Diane Keaton in a witty and wacky romantic comedy

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Three vampires try to blend into modern society while still feeding their fiendish urges

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: Epic biopic of one of America's most influential political leaders. The film traces Malcolm's life and the development of his philosophy, from a difficult childhood in Harlem and Boston, via his conversion to Islam and his rejection of integration and non-violent resistance, to his eventual renunciation of his separatist beliefs

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: Lonely bartender Bob gets caught up in a robbery gone wrong thanks to his crooked cousin and boss Marv

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Spooky comedy about a couple (Alec Baldwin and Geena Davis) who return from the dead to enjoy an indefinite 'life' as ghosts in their old house. However, when their peaceful afterlife is invaded by a ghastly family of the living, they find themselves resorting to drastic measures to clear them out. Michael Keaton co-stars as the mischievous title character

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 3
programme.desc: Set prior to the haunting of the Lambert family, this prequel focuses on a psychic who contacts the dead in order to help a teenage girl who's being haunted

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: A brother and sister discover a lair full of modified bodies and before they know it are on the run from a terrifying beast on a ritualistic killing spree

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: After their plane crashes in the Amazon, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rainforest are captured by a tribe of cannibals

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: In this chilling sequel, two young brothers (Dartanian Sloan and Robert Daniel Sloan) must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader and his new partner Robin do battle with DA Harvey Dent and vengeful scientist The Riddler. Action adventure

programme.title: Murderous Intent
programme.desc: Gripping psychological study delving into the well-constructed murder of an upper-class British schoolboy (Tom Sturridge) by a classmate (Eddie Redmayne). Strangely, evidence suggests that the minds of the two young men may have become one. Toni Collette, who also serves as an executive producer, costars as the forensic psychologist investigating the case who discovers a disturbing connection between the two. Written and directed by Gregory J. Read

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Former covert operative Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson) must race to protect his daughter while tracking down the criminals who framed him for killing his wife in the adrenaline -fueled third chapter of the Taken saga. Bryan and his ex-wife Lenore (Famke Janssen) are taking their first tentative steps toward reconciliation when she is viciously murdered, and he is targeted as the prime suspect. Now, with the CIA, FBI, and every cop in the country hot on his trail, Bryan realizes that it's only a matter of time before his enemies get to his daughter Kim (Maggie Grace), too. Determined to keep her alive at any cost, he realizes that his only hope for saving her is to clear his name before he is captured. But while Bryan does possess the "particular set of skills" to stay one step ahead of the men who want his entire family dead, proving that he's innocent of murder and seeing that the real killers face justice might be the last thing he ever does

programme.title: Renaissance Man
programme.desc: Comedy about a former ad executive who is forced by circumstances to take a temporary job teaching bottom-of-the-pile recruits at an Army training camp. Because of their below-average reading and writing skills, the youngsters seem unlikely to be accepted by the Army, but their new teacher turns out to possess a gift for motivating his students

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: Remake of the 1947 film about a youngster whose scepticism about Santa is challenged by a man claiming to be Kriss Kringle

programme.title: The World According to Garp
programme.desc: Based on the John Irving novel, this film chronicles the life of T S Garp and his mother, Jenny. Whilst Garp sees himself as a "serious" writer, Jenny writes a feminist manifesto at an opportune time and finds herself as a magnet for all manner of distressed women

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: In this terrifying gothic romance, a mysterious stranger woos a young woman and brings her to his mansion atop a clay mountain. There, she learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets as she fights for her sanity and her very life

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie directs this true-life tale of Louis Zamperini, the Olympic track star who survived a plane crash in World War II, only to fight for his life against nature and eventually as a prisoner of war. Joel and Ethan Coen provide the script. Louis (Jack O'Connell) grows up a rough-hewn kid on the verge of becoming a full-on delinquent, until his brother starts training him to be a track star. Louis excels at the sport, and eventually represents America at the 1936 Summer Olympics in Berlin. During his training, he learns to become resilient and disciplined; his brother's words of advice, "If you can take it, you can make it," push him to overcome any adversity. He must live up to that adage under the most extreme circumstances after his plane is shot down during another bombing raid. He is stranded at sea for more than a month, only to be found by the Japanese and forced to endure constant physical abuse at the hands of sadistic prison-camp guard Mutsuhiro Watanabe (Japanese pop star Miyavi), who wants to break Louis' indomitable spirit

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Witch Queen, who has returned from the dead, in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance

programme.title: Barb Wire
programme.desc: A bounty hunter's town and business are under siege by warring factions in this futuristic fantasy about comic-book babe Barb Wire

programme.title: We Don't Live Here Anymore
programme.desc: A pair of Andre Dubus novellas are the basis for this well-acted and emotionally raw character study. Mark Ruffalo, Laura Dern, Naomi Watts and Peter Krause star as two couples in a small college town whose lives are undermined by infidelity, self-indulgence and marital ennui. Sam Charles, Haili Page, Jennifer Bishop

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: Four friends get in over their heads when they become indebted to a dangerous crime boss. Now, they must kidnap a beloved member of a rival kingpin's family in order to erase their debt, and do so without getting caught or killed in the process
